Reviews.Title: “Great for folks traveling on a budget!”
Reviews.Author: mollybeatrice
Reviews.Content: little nervous hotel based mixed reviews trip advisor booked based unbeatable price absolutely satisfied stay recommend hotel wholeheartedly priorities match hotel hotel clean spacious european standards centrally located double bed twin beds pushed yeah wifi internet connection phone clean plenty space bigish bathroom hotel friendly staff included lovely authentic italian breakfast downstairs price id steal expensive bunk beds hostel

Reviews.Title: “Fully Satisfied”
Reviews.Author: Suci L
Reviews.Content: rome 49 january 2012 stayed hotel worth price dont expect steak burger staffs friendly helpful door allow smoke hang clothes outside wash clothes elevator fits maximum 2 person chose stairs instead simple breakfast morning affordable restaurants nearby delicious taste bit bothered wall ripped fine

Reviews.Title: “Good for price”
Reviews.Author: drummerSwanseaU_k_
Reviews.Content: spent days febuary time hotel fine cheap central hotel walk safety romes sites rome expensive resonably priced restaurants bars close found staff cafe downstairs helpfull

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: jayp49
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located near stazione termini close trattorias frequented locals clean adequate frills walk flight steps lobby elevator starts ar lobby level inoperative pile basically 75 euro night value compared pricey hotels citythe staff friendly helpful arranging taxi airport euro train

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Place! Avoid!”
Reviews.Author: Suzy1284
Reviews.Content: worst stay visiting rome hotel located termini hotel wierd extra dirty honest front hotel lies strip club third transportation hotel bad near metro buses complicated understand avoid termini avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Mixed bag”
Reviews.Author: citizenK8
Reviews.Content: decent location near various embassies 10 minute walk station nice cheap restaurant opposite fair sized clean fridge comfortable breakfast excited doors plumbing noisy ours smelly ie occasional foul waft probably wouldnt stay maybe unlucky apart hotel ok price

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and great value”
Reviews.Author: pony1127
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel virginia nights takes 1015 mins rome termini hotel hotel located quiet corner receptionists nice clean night sleep enjoyed simple breakfast provided downstairs

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, convenient and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: PrincessBella67
Reviews.Content: arrived rome hotel booking stay 34 nights arrived hotel told 40 euros ensuite queen night renovating werent accommodate late day accepted 3rd floor elevator clean little run bathroom shampoo soap supplied hairdryer towels etc tiny bed fitting little balcony table 2 chairs inside tv plenty channels couple english ample closet space safe due renovated probably beautiful time little shabby rundown clean comfortable breakfast included coffee pastry lovely café door reception staff friendly loved told stay nights hotel short walk roma termini 10 minutes trevi fountain metro overall stay amazing rates quality couldnt definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “noisy and small double room”
Reviews.Author: olovelyworld
Reviews.Content: actual double photos worse noisy nights people comes goes time slam doors bathroom essentially lean head wall sitting loo shower didnt properly neither overall unhappy experience hotel located pleasant neither hard quality restaurants nearby advantage close train station 15 min walk actually explains

Reviews.Title: “Was Ok!”
Reviews.Author: PaulaMalta
Reviews.Content: location close attractions walk holiday excellent lift floor floors stairs floor ok luggages werent heavy breakfast bar below hotel croissant drink satisfactory bit noisy meet 2am chat corridor unfortunately howerver hotel budget

Reviews.Title: “Basic, but not bad at all..”
Reviews.Author: Vasilis26
Reviews.Content: perfect location bathroom clean times bathroom 24hour reception times visited spacious reasonable price centre rome wifi common pc bit especially hallway walls lift till floor breakfast worth paying croissant ad coffee nearby cafe budget accomodation centre rome expensive days hotel bad

Reviews.Title: “Great location, terrible sleep”
Reviews.Author: Tadzmahal
Reviews.Content: hotel superbly located it´s near termini station sleep quality bad double bed springs makes partner jump move sleep sleeping floor bathroom water sink stink lot reception bigger towel floor service reception random guys lot helped didn´t rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: clareoz
Reviews.Content: hotel close termini train station walking distance city plenty buses close value air conditioning quiet spacious evening front desk guy awesome buses catch eat etc helpful indeed little downside slight smell bathroom highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for your money, great location”
Reviews.Author: lovetotravelGuelph
Reviews.Content: booked hotel virginia telephone giorgio credit card flying roma night little nervous booking 5 tired travellers ready waiting looking reasonable located stay rome draining pocketbook deserves look staff friendly helpful sporting dated décor clean comfortable location walking distance termini station plus breakfast includes coffee cake croissant local bar door day

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: banzai0
Reviews.Content: booked quadruple hotel virginia minute venerecom accommodation meet expectations hotel close proximity roma termini ten minutes walk pain dragging luggages cab instead avoided arriving hotel puffing drenched sweat hot left train station 1 elevator ground floor carry luggages reception floor 2 rate quadruple quoted venerecom value considering rome 3 ensuite bathroom ac relatively clean free breakfast 4 sri lankan manned front desk friendly helpful 1 cramped beds shower stall challenge bulky people 2 internet wifi available 3 breakfast croissant juice served outside hotel bar located corner via outweighed hotel served purpose family especially plop beds exhausting day touring rome

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value.”
Reviews.Author: cescalina1988
Reviews.Content: mix hotel booked left friends rome stay online found gem 5 minutes walk termini station includes bus station metro station able 2 days deal city bars restaurants near hotel 5 pizzerias 1 minute radius hotel coupons breakfast bar corner morning clean comfortable ensuite facilities paid 60 euros night double translated 30 head feel exceptional value hotel perfectly suited base sightseeing weekend rome remember booked day arrived booking advance prices definately recommend hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Virginia Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Montebello 94, 00185 Rome, Italy
